p: Wistar albino rats weighing 130-190 g were kept at control temperature (26 ± 2°C) in a 12 hr light and dark cycle. They were provided with standard rodent feed and water ad libitum. The study protocols were approved by the institutional committee, i.e., PREC (Pharmacy Research Ethics Committee) of the Department of Pharmacy, Faculty of Pharmacy and Alternative Medicine, the Islamia University of Bahawalpur.
